lender.name: Elton

lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: B. Chandran
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in helping people at a micro level. I specially believe women are a powerful being. They truly can change the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze big businesses in terms of their insurability and how much premium they should pay

lender.name: tammy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled but volunteer my time by playing music for organizations in my hometown.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of contributing to someone's life from afar.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Canadian musicians to use the Internet to sell their goods.

lender.name: Beth & Ed
lender.loan_because: Because we can!

lender.name: Gail and David
lender.loan_because: we have lived in Asia and want to help the wonderful people we met and those like them better their world

lender.name: Jo-Anne
lender.occupational_info: artisan

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I know from experience, that sometimes a person needs 'a lift up' in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in town as an adm. assistant, and after-hours live and work at home in a rural area, on a small hillside farm. I have older children.

lender.name: Derek, Liz and Jamie
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped us along the way, and now we want to help others in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Grade 8 Math, Gym, Science and Social Studies.

lender.name: David and Beverly
lender.loan_because: It's a Christmas gift my family provided.
lender.occupational_info: David works in a University managing the operations of biomedical research and Beverly teaches Biology and Envirommental Science to High School students.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We've needed help at times ourselves and feel blessed when we can help someone else even in a small way
lender.occupational_info: travel to stores to sell them art supplies, they in turn sell to the public

lender.name: Karli
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given the opportunity to make their lives and their world better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a university professor. I do research on biology in the ocean.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: It will be for a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: janis-karmic stone
lender.loan_because:
of my committment to karma yoga- the practice of helping others. A portion of the proceeds from each work of art is donated to kiva.
The ability to help others in a meaningful way gives my art, and therby my life, true purpose.
lender.occupational_info:
As an artist on the path to self-discovery and a desire to be more present and alive, "karmic stone" evolved.
Mindfulness, meditation, a passion for yoga, the search for balance and the need to slow down and embrace life all combined to create the opportunity for karmic stone to manifest itself.
I was drawn to stone as a medium in which to express my creativity while seeking my own sense of permanence and the need to be grounded.
Stone provided a solid foundation from which to grow. While I had been an architectural designer and preferred the blank page, I discovered that stone holds many secrets and mysteries, which come together in creating a work of art. Each type of stone has its own unique texture, underlying colors, wich may or may not reveal themselves, density, and a unique history- from its origins and formation to how it has evolved over the ages.
Each work of art requires mindfulness and focus. As a design is carved, the stone presents its own uniqueness just as it is supposed to. Just as in life, unfolding as it is supposed to. Right now. In this moment.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I've been where these people are; with just a little help I made it. I would like to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my husband in the construction industry.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: This is a "no brainer". The best program of micro-financing available.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase a big property and divide the investment into smaller slices so many people can participate in the possibility of success.

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I hope to change the world we live in and have an impact on someone's life

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: I want all children to have the same opportunities as my daughter.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: change starts on the ground floor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Social Studies in a high school in New Jersey.

lender.name: Patricia

lender.occupational_info: Work with Primary Health

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because:
A poem by Spike Milligan.
Christmas 1970
A little girl called Sile Javotte Said "look at the lovely presents I've got" While a little girl in Biafra said Oh what a lovely slice of bread".

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help end suffering in the world. I want to help women become independent and able to support themselves and their families if necessary, and provide education to their children.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Fairbanks, Alaska - very cold in winter -40 C, and in summer +40 C. I have traveled and lived on the road in India, and am very fond of this part of the world. I know what it means to be poor and have no food or shelter. But God's LOVE is greatest...through mutual love and understanding let us work out our differences.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This is an easy way to help someone, and nice to see the person and read about their projects.
lender.occupational_info: Working in the visitors wing.

lender.name: camilo
lender.loan_because: money in the right hands can make the world better.
lender.occupational_info: I build, deploy and maintain computer networks and their inter-connected systems.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: I want other citizens of the world to have opportunities to live a better life and contribute the the betterment of this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals who have experienced physical, emotional trauma in their lives. I help them get their life back in order so that they can live a life of purpose and meaning.

lender.name: Edd
lender.loan_because: A friend gave me this as a Christmas gift - a great idea - and I look forward to using this gift to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people who have emotional or mental problems.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I like the premise of this organization - many people making relatively modest loans can combine their efforts to make a huge difference. Also, it's set up in such a way to allow you to take a more active role. You're not just writing a check and hoping for the best. Rather, you can decide which activities to fund and can at least get a sense of the impact that your contribution is making.
lender.occupational_info: I perform tests on pharmaceutical drug candidates to make sure that they have the characteristics necessary for use in treating human diseases.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe that big change always comes from a series of small actions.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care about all the world, and I want to help those that are less fortunate than me.

lender.name: Anne
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers learn more about East Asia so they can teach American children about the people in East Asia.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to make other people's lives better. I like to help people. My Poppa and Nanny gave me this for Christmas present.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and work on growing up. I work at gymnastics and with my family.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It's time that capitalism starts helping disadvantaged people.

lender.name: Hayden
lender.loan_because: I like to help poeple who are not as fortunate as me. Thanks to my Nanny and Poppa who gave me the chance to give to people who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, I help my family with chores and I play soccer for Empire United. I am the goalie.

lender.name: cumulusguy
lender.loan_because: I like the work ethic I've personally witnessed during my travels to so-called third-world countries.

lender.name: Walter & Sherry
lender.occupation: Stay at Home Mom and Database Developer

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Access to start up and working capital is critical for entrepreneurs everywhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the internet full time. I am also a team member for micro-finance/enterprise development organization.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my kids and work outside of our home as well.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's a sustainable way to help people

lender.name: FutureGen Capital
lender.loan_because: As a successful business involved in commercial real estate we feel it is important to assist small business owners around the world at a chance of success.
lender.occupational_info: Since 2009, we at FGC have been maximizing investment leverage, thus producing high-yielding returns for our clients. FGC accomplishes this by using varied investment strategies based on the current economic conditions, and offering distinctive options for those interested in high-yield investments.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: We are all in this (world) together!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it feels good to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help people tell their stories so that others can understand.

lender.name: RubyDoo
lender.loan_because: Kiva rocks!

lender.name: Larry and Barb
lender.loan_because: It's amazing that such a small amount of money can make such a difference.

lender.name: Pratik
lender.occupational_info: I research and provide capital to large and small corporations, investing in their debt and equity.

lender.name: PJM
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can to help others make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the University of Texas, one of the largest and most prestigious universities in the United States; with a student body of over 50,000. I am the Executive Assistant to the Executive Director of the student unions. I love my job because of the interaction with students, and the opportunity to work in a stimulating environment. I was fortunate to be involved when the student union hosted His Holiness the Dalai Lama, Bill Gates, Maya Angelou, and many other inspiring speakers.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to give back; when someone does something good for me I want to "pay it forward" keep it moving and try to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library helping students with their research

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I come from a family and spiritual tradition that values serving others. I believe that each person deserves a "hand up" so their unique gifts may be shared with the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit whose mission is to provide emergency services to help people on their path to self sufficiency.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: I care about helping others. I've been lucky to live a very nice life with little hardship. So, if I can help others enjoy a life similar to mine, I am even more satisfied with life itself.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I would not be where I am today if someone did not loan me money to get started.

lender.name: Monterrosa Family
lender.loan_because: We're happier if you're happier
lender.occupational_info: Mom takes care of sick children. Dad makes movies for high-school students. Kids take care of small children.

lender.name: Gigi
lender.loan_because: people around the world need our help! :)

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I live in the lucky country, and would like others to be just as lucky.

lender.name: plazamilano
lender.occupational_info:
Plazamilano.com is an exciting destination for designer accessories and handbags dedicated to providing the best prices, selection, and overall experience you'll find online. To put it simply--we LOVE designer handbags. We've created a unique store that offers our customers the ability to find what they want easily and quickly, and with our free ground shipping, 14 day returns and 100% money back guarantee we offer our customers a no-risk opportunity to try us.
http://www.plazamilano.com

lender.name: The Garland Group
lender.loan_because: Our business started as an entrepreneurial venture---many people helped us, and this is a way to give back and encourage others to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: We do technology audits and security testing for banks and financial institutions.

lender.name: sekimonryu
lender.loan_because: a small sum of money in an entrepreneur's hand, they tend to grow and benefit many people.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business as a tool for change.

lender.name: carola
lender.loan_because: A stranger handed me 50 dollars at x mas time.........I wanted to pay it forward...
lender.occupational_info: I work with fresh herbs

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, so they could have good lives.

lender.name: Sara
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick infants and new moms in the hospital

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: I thought KIVA is a first & easy step to make the world better.
lender.occupational_info: Studying business management, especially social entrepreneur. I belong to AIESEC, non-profit, world-wide, student organization.

lender.name: Eddie & Gabriela
lender.loan_because: Because Gabriela is from Peru and we want to help hard-working Peruvians help themselves by offering a little access to credit. We love Peru (but we've recently begun lending in other countries, too)!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have Paypal! And because I can.
lender.occupational_info: My work? It consists of wasting my time going to school, and yes, it is a waste of time when I could be doing it at home by myself!

lender.loan_because: rising up against the odds is a chance worth taking.
lender.occupational_info: I am a University student of Psychology

lender.name: Halvor
lender.loan_because: Member of Rotary International. - Service above self.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Harinarayanan
lender.loan_because: I know the pain of a farmer and most of the other working class.So I thank my father for having given me the education that helps me today to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and Iam doing research on breast cancer and would hope to be a scientist one day

lender.name: Juha-Petteri
lender.loan_because: This kind of help I would like to receive if Lady Fortune had chosen so that I had been born in poor conditions instead of the prosperous north.

lender.name: Dan Ednie
lender.loan_because: It I know it will make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and perform a game called Footbag. Which is an active fun game where you kick a bean bag also known as a "hackysack". I'm also a tour guide in Japanese

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to find ways to support each other.
lender.occupational_info: Helping children and families.

lender.name: Alicia and Guy
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupation: Delivery Person And Web Site Owner
lender.loan_because: I'm of the belief Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime. Kiva combines two great things to me. Helping others and teaching others how to help themselves. Win - Win!
lender.occupational_info: I delivery items to people who have more money/credit than sense. I run ecommerce sites from my home.

lender.name: Morton Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is truly blessed with God's love and life's good fortune. We are very privileged to have more than what we need to thrive...in a world where most people have barely enough to survive. Our ability (through Kiva) to help other people to invest in themselves is a great way for us to share our good fortune. As it is often said "Life is like a roll of the dice!" We've been pretty lucky so far...It is our sincere hope that people we loan to can feel the same way!
lender.occupational_info: I owned and operated a manufacturing facility for 30 years. I worked very hard, long hours and had the very good fortune to thrive. In the early years I struggled with loans with interest rates as high as 21%. I know how difficult it can be to borrow money as a small business owner. It is now my turn to give back.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: it is my way to give back to society for the richness that surrounds my life. Empowering women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a Canadian university in the Arabian Peninsula (Qatar) assisting in raising health education standards.

lender.name: Rodger
lender.loan_because: Without politics involved, I want to make a difference in the lives of my world neighbors who are trying to better themselves and their families.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I research and write about election law for the government, to help make elections more fair and accessible.

lender.name: Dasha
lender.loan_because: i believe in acts of kindness & I believe in entrepreneurship being entrepreneur myself, all the best and do not give up
lender.occupational_info: I own a small IT company with my husband and we do help SMEs to automate their business with the help of our custom made software solutions

lender.name: The Dickson Family
lender.loan_because: we don't need another CD, sweater, computer game or toy. We need a better world in which we are all cared for. We need all of us.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family, young and old who want to do a little bit more.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: it amazes me that people in such unfortunate positions can use what they have and make the best out of their lives. I want to give people the same opportunities that I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Texas A&M University studying accounting

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who have great business ideas!
lender.occupational_info: I give advise to people who have parking problems.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: We should help those less fortunate than ourselves. Someone gave me a chance at a great career and I would like to do the same
lender.occupational_info: I am the dean at a college that serves underprivledged students

lender.name: FreeMicroloan.com
lender.loan_because: It's another way to encourage people to do good.
lender.occupational_info: I blog about how to do good and when people comment on the blog, they generate money to fund microloans

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: I want to help out

lender.name: Becky and Jesse
lender.loan_because: We like to help out those in need
lender.occupational_info: We are trying to learn more about the world through our studies

lender.name: Emerson Diaz
lender.loan_because: I want to help deserving people improve their lives and pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Webmaster by profession, someone who makes websites and profit from the internet.

lender.name: kirk
lender.occupational_info: I develop kits for vehicle to run on natural gas (CNG) in addition to gasoline. Bi-fuel vehicles they are called.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I feel a duty to help! In the end we are all one!
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching theatre practice to all kind of people. I run a theatre in a home for elderly people and I work as a clown in hospitals.

lender.name: Karencita
lender.loan_because: a missions trip to Chiapas, Mexico, opened my eyes to the REAL needs of others in this world, and KIVA makes it possible, from home, for me to share my blessings with those less fortunate far away. THANKS to dearest Yvonne.

lender.name: Cans Help Others
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in making changes in the world; I've already donated over $5000 to American organizations, and I'd like to expand that to where my money might have an even greater experience.
lender.occupational_info: People drop off aluminum cans that they don't need, usually from soda, and I recycle them and receive money.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Every entrepreneur should be given a chance to live their dream. Through hard work and determination, each person can improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently researching pediatric heart disease, specifically aortic valve disease, at a local children's hospital. I also write children's books.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It is important to allow people to improve their quality of life and to prosper where they live. A loan is much better for them because it gives them a hand toward success. Success improves their own self worth.

lender.name: Norman & Cathy
lender.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do in this world.
lender.occupational_info: My company specializes in tourism to 11 countries in Africa. We also specialize in India. giving back to those countries that afford us a living is only right

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people like Rose.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young adults how to read stories closely and carefully.

lender.name: Janel
lender.loan_because: I like to be generous. Kiva is a great way to be generous globally.

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.

lender.name: Lakshmi Franziska
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping each other to make this world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am the vice president of Universal Life Studies Institute, a non-profit organization promoting holistic lifestyle and alternative health. Several years ago we founded a small health food store to support our teachings with products.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: We are all doing our best to navigate the turbulent seas of life. The highest calling we can have, is to stop and offer our hand to another in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to communicate what they do to the marketplace through many forms of marketing and advertising.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with love and kindness, and I'd like the world to feel this way.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: God first loved me and blessed me. I want to share my blessings with other children of God.
lender.occupational_info: I help women learn to be healthier through exerciseand proper diet. I also build stained glass windows and paint.

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and keep helping.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I am dissatisfied with the conditions and demands organizations like the WTO and IMF impose on peoples of third world countries, while we subsidize our own farmers, creating unfair competition conditions. By loaning at a reasonable rate of interest without additional demands, I hope to help level the global playing field.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of global community and the privilege and responsibility we have to support each other in our goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature and writing to high school students.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who is helping himself/herself. My 1st loan was repaid within approx 6 months. I was amazed and more than willing to continue lending. If one person succeeds in his or her business, this in turn will help others - be it family, new co-workers etc.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ex-CUSO volunteer (1974-76) in Ghana. I have worked at many different jobs - currently working in sales from my home. Since building my own home - with loans - I have always done what is necessary to repay these - working at whatever job I could find. I appreciate the hardships encountered by those seeking loans through Kiva and I wish them much success.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: "The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to proclaim release to the captives and the regaining of sight to the blind, to set free those who are oppressed, to proclaim the year of the Lord's favor." (Luke 4:1819 NET)

lender.name: Mark and Libertad
lender.occupational_info: One teaches math at a university and the other helps improve traffic conditions.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It is a sustainable way to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank buying and selling energy products.

lender.name: Summer
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the fastest and most effective ways to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and writing to secondary students (ages 11-18).

lender.name: laura
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Computer software sales

lender.name: Yuan
lender.loan_because: I need to share the same grace and love that I freely receive from my father God!

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves chances to dream and to see them supported by others. It brings me much joy to see their progress

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are trying to improve their lives and avoid government interference at both ends.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Helping is where it's at. Politics are best left out, as this detracts from the purpose.
lender.occupational_info: Various roles in health care. I've primarily worked as an emergency medical technician, and in various administrative roles.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is required." (The Book of St. Matthew)
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able collaborate with other artists in creating theatre that can teach, transform, entertain, and heal our hearts, our souls, and our communities.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve a better quality of life and realise their full potential.

lender.name: KATHY
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Brizendine Family
lender.loan_because: We feel good about helping others reach their dreams and goals, create better futures for their children. Our donation comes with prayers and best wishes for success!
lender.occupational_info: Brad helps companies advertise their businesses and grow. Yolande helps children with disabilities to learn life skills.

lender.name: Scoop
lender.occupational_info: I dance, I act, I take pictures of people and the world around me, and I teach children to do what I do.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage independence for women.
lender.occupational_info: I check for purity of water.

lender.name: L. Reyes
lender.loan_because: I believe in the strength that self empowerment gives to people of different social, economic and cultural backgrounds.
lender.occupational_info: I train teachers and students in the use of different technologies (computers, the internet, etc) for a better learning and teaching experience.

lender.name: Susan Falk
lender.loan_because: It is a small but important way to help and share what I am lucky to have with others that might not.
lender.occupational_info: I work with doctors who help people to see better.

lender.name: CassMatt
lender.loan_because: It's fun to get the email stories
lender.occupational_info: Kids ages 10 and 13

lender.name: river of joy
lender.occupational_info: We are a community of faith that seeks to engage the world creatively through Christ. We work together to make a difference in the lives of our neighbors both locally and globally.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: I study environmental sciences and policy.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals and because I can.

lender.name: Wei Sher Law
lender.loan_because: How can I not?
lender.occupational_info: I help immigrants obtain legal status and nationality in the United States.

lender.name: Ken & Jenny Freeborn
lender.loan_because: We visited Africa in 2007 and have a granddaughter from Ethiopia, and believe we can help to make difference in peoples lives through this program.
lender.occupational_info: Ken is a retired Kwantlen Polytechnic University instructor. Jenny is recently retired from being a Childcare Consultant

lender.name: Dennis and Ruth
lender.loan_because: we are so blessed and others have so little. We see it as our duty to help support fellow travellers in this life.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired educators.

lender.name: Tom, Liz & Edith
lender.occupation: we comprise an accountant, teacher & baby
lender.loan_because: ... actually i often wonder if my family should make loans, not because of getting my money back but because of environmental consequences [of the way the money might be used] and because I worry that I am helping create a sort of artificial capital "market" that is intrinsically flawed both sides: for the lender there is FX risk and negative ROI, and within the borrower economy inflationary pressures, the threat of usury. But still there are many positives to micro financing, and the question ... what would you have happen instead ?

lender.name: Bailey Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching

lender.name: Chris & Marija
lender.loan_because: I like to see people working for their own better futures.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I'd like to feel that perhaps in some small way I might be spreading joy in the world.

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: We in the west generally have access to so many resources to fufill our needs and dreams. It only seems fitting to share some of our good fortune with people less fortunate in other parts of the world. In times of need I have been fortunate tenough o access the economic resources needed to move forward in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a drug and alcohol counsellor with the most marginalized people in Canada. In addition to addictions, the people I work with struggle with criminal charges, mental health issues, poverty, racism, and many other concerns. The Vancouver Drug Treatment Court is a diversion program designed to provide people who are commiting crime because of active addictions with an opportunity to reclaim their lives from addiction. I also teach Buddhist meditation.

lender.name: Carol-Lynne
lender.loan_because: I'm intrigued by what people can accomplish with a little encouragement and help.
lender.occupational_info: I make natural, chemical and preservative free soaps and sell them, as a small home business.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: someone made me....and now i like it.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure documents say what they mean. (and mean what they say)

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have received lots of help and support in my life and I want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I raise and teach my children at home.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: At Christmas, my family and I donate money to students in Kibaale Uganda who are in desperate need of help. Our family donates money to a cause we believe in, instead of giving a bunch of Christmas presents to each other. My Uncle's gift to our family this year was a gift certificate to Kiva. Thank you Uncle Glenn!
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I believe people forget how fortunate they are in life, and it's important to help those who are not.

lender.name: Frank Petter
lender.loan_because: it feels good
